name: Robert L. KEITH, Jr., Aldo D. Mirarchi, Edward A. Moffet, and Glenn W. Claudfelter, Appellants, v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS OF the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Labor and Industry of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and Phico Services Company, Appellees

parties: Robert L. KEITH, Jr., Aldo D. Mirarchi, Edward A. Moffet, and Glenn W. Claudfelter, Appellants, v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS OF the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Labor and Industry of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and Phico Services Company, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of December, 1998, we AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
720 A.2d 1050
Robert L. KEITH, Jr., Aldo D. Mirarchi, Edward A. Moffet, and Glenn W. Claudfelter, Appellants, v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS OF the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Labor and Industry of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and Phico Services Company, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 23, 1998.
